title: The new honor sistem.
body: Does anybody know how much honors i need for honor level3?

replies.body: There's no tracker to tell you the progress but it should roughly take about a month or two of consistent honours, i.e it's gonna take a little while

To be clear, there's no "pre-set" quantity of Honours that you need to receive before levelling up. The system is more about consistency than quantity, so there's no real way to "track" your progress, even if you record every honour you receive. The only difference that receiving honours will make is that you will progress (slightly) faster.
